What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have a lot of mountains and forests in play
2. Cast Flinthoof Boar
3. Next turn cast another Flithoof Boar

What is the expected output? - player can pay a Mountain for a new Flinthoof Boar to get haste

What do you see instead? - only the first (old) Flinthoof Boar can get haste, not the new one


What version of the product are you using? 1.40
On what operating system? Win7
author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Activated abilities of creatures in play cannot be activated for second creature with the same name
